title: Funerary Chamber of Manlia Felicitas
description: A subterranean funerary chamber with three frescoes walls depicting animal and vegetal life, located around the third mile of the Via Appia.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate location of the tomb, after Wuilleumier 1951.
properties.title: Imagery location of Funerary Chamber of Manlia Felicitas
